page.title: 02The Wheelock By-Pass
page.content: {Sandbach}and{Wheelock}need a{By-Pass because of the heavy traffic between {Crewe}and the{Sandbach}M.6 interchange.Right from the begining there were 4 possible routes.The red ,green,purple and orange routes.All of the routes will cost about 5 million pounds.The green route will go right through someones house.The red route will go around the back of both Sandbach (the main town) and Wheelock (the village).The green route and red route people went to a lot of trouble to draw up maps and charts to show the different routes.Most people seemed to favour the red route but the Cheshire councillors chose the green route.Besides the By-Pass there is an inner road which takes traffic away from the centre of Sandbach.Some of the people of Sandbach complained about the noise of the diggers.
